channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: WBD adds 6.4 million Max subscribers, forecasts 150 million subs by end of 2026
item.description: Warner Bros. Discovery said Thursday it added 6.4 million global streaming subscribers in the fourth quarter for a total of 116.9 million subscribers.

item.title: Nvidia's auto segment revenue surges to record high on demand for driver-assist tech
item.description: U.S. chipmaker Nvidia's auto segment revenue doubled in the latest quarter to its highest on record as demand for driver-assist software picked up.

item.title: We're lifting our price target on off-price retailer TJX after another strong quarter
item.description: The stock climbed more than 3%, to over $126 a share.

item.title: Snowflake surges 8% on earnings beat as company expands AI push
item.description: Snowflake announced an expanded partnership with Microsoft Azure to offer access to OpenAI models on Wednesday.

item.title: Shares of British aerospace giant Rolls-Royce hit all-time high on upbeat outlook, profit beat
item.description: Rolls-Royce on Thursday posted stronger-than-expected full-year earnings after making what it described as "significant" transformation progress.
